tooltip_threshold: Voice activity detection threshold. Lower values make the system more sensitive to voice activity.
tooltip_prefix_padding: Amount of audio to include before detected speech begins (in milliseconds).
tooltip_silence_duration: Duration of silence required to consider speech ended (in milliseconds).
tooltip_idle_timeout: Maximum duration of inactivity before ending the session (in milliseconds).
Микрофон недоступен. Для работы микрофон: Microphone not available. HTTPS or localhost is required for microphone access.
analyticTooltip: When enabled, analytics are automatically generated after each conversation: dialogue quality score (CSAT), intent recognition, sentiment analysis, scenario efficiency, and key metrics. Data is available in reports.
allowHangupTooltip: When enabled, the assistant can independently end the conversation when the task is completed or at the caller's request. When disabled, only the caller can end the call.
allowTransferTooltip: When enabled, the assistant can redirect the call to an operator, employee, or queue. For proper operation, specify a directory with numbers in the prompt or functions. ⚠️ Call transfer does not work in Playground as there is no PBX connection.
tooltip_temperature: Controls the model's 'creativity'. Lower values (0.6) produce more stable and predictable responses. Higher values (1.2) produce more diverse but less precise responses.
